00033 #ifndef __BOP_VERTEX_H__
00034 #define __BOP_VERTEX_H__
00035 
00036 #include "BOP_Tag.h"
00037 #include "BOP_Indexs.h"
00038 #include "MT_Point3.h"
00039 #include "BOP_Misc.h"
00040 
00041 class BOP_Vertex 
00042 {
00043 private:
00044     MT_Point3 m_point;
00045     BOP_Indexs  m_edges;
00046     BOP_TAG m_tag;
00047     
00048     bool containsEdge(BOP_Index i);
00049 
00050 public:
00051     BOP_Vertex(double x, double y, double z);
00052     BOP_Vertex(MT_Point3 d);
00053     void addEdge(BOP_Index i);
00054     void removeEdge(BOP_Index i);
00055     inline BOP_Index getEdge(unsigned int i) { return m_edges[i];};
00056     inline unsigned int getNumEdges() { return m_edges.size();};
00057     inline BOP_Indexs &getEdges() { return m_edges;};
00058     inline MT_Point3 getPoint() const { return m_point;};
00059     inline BOP_TAG getTAG() { return m_tag;};
00060     inline void setTAG(BOP_TAG t) { m_tag = t;};
00061 #ifdef BOP_DEBUG
00062     friend ostream &operator<<(ostream &stream, BOP_Vertex *v);
00063 #endif
